name: City Of Hope
content: Guiding through a way in the night
Rainbows in the sky neon lights
前方的路通往新的高度
那是一座让你感到光明的城市
We can reach for the sky
让我们可以触及天际的地方
And hope will give us a chance
希望可以给我们带来机遇
Open up your eyes  you'll realize
放宽你的视野，你将发现
The city that will change the way
这座城市赋予你新的方式
Looking through the window of time
I believe a future that shines
One by one we search and we will find
Build a better place for all of mankind
为人类铸造一个更好的环境
We could reach for the sky
让我们可以触及天际的地方
And hope will give us a chance
希望可以给我们带来机遇
Open up your eyes  you will realize
放宽你的视野，你将发现
这座城市赋予你新的方式
The way you are make you fly
让我们找到肩并肩的方法
Oh yeah  city always by your side Yeah
哦耶，希望之城在你身边，耶
